name: AtmaSphere (demo)
description:
AtmaSphere is rolling ball game set in a medieval world which is full of dangerous traps and risky paths! Roll all you want, but don't fall!

It's easy to grasp navigating Ballard, but can you get him to Ballerina safely?

Every new and different level made by the developer is making 
that hard for him!

Help Ballard overcome all nasty and treacherous troubles
and make them together while collecting coins and diamonds! Join the fun and 
help them become one!

You can ALWAYS get on discord and talk to me about the game! <3
